name: Gangtok - Yumthang and Lachung
description: The extreme eastern part of India mainly comprises of some of the most captivating and picture-perfect hill stations. Originating from Gangtok, this tour also takes the visitors to the enchanting and evergreen valleys of Lachung, Yumthang and Pelling. This tour is an ideal getaway to explore and discover the magnificence of the hill stations and have a glimpse of life and culture of these regions. This tour is indeed one of the best tours to unfold the mystique beauty of the eastern parts of India.
